www.heavymetal.com

For those who have downloaded this torrent before:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6462848/Heavy_Metal_Magazine_1977-20011___Specials_(541_issues)
Just download the folders 2011 and 2012. All other files are the same even if their names are different. 
I have been doing some work organizing this collection. Files were renamed in the same pattern. Duplicates were removed.
Thanks for the upload. I love this magazine!
Really? 130 leechers and only 3 seeders? greedy focks!

Some of the files in the folder HeavyMetal Presents requires passwords, for example the file: Heavy Metal Presents - The Swords of Heaven, the Flowers of Hell (Moorcock, Chaykin) (1979) cannot open unless a password is entered. Please help, thanks.

kokleunam,
I have just tried both unpacking the file with WinRAR and opening the file with ComicRack. All worked just fine. The file is not password protected and there shouldn't be any problems with it. Try again the way I have mentioned. Hope this time it is ok.
Ok, i'll give it a try again, and thanks v much for assisting and the upload! I will help seeding
